title: Load persisted HUD position on page reload
description: When HUD is moved and page is reloaded, HUD should appear at last saved position
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Drag HUD to a new position (e.g., top-left)
3. Note the position coordinates
4. Reload the page (F5)
5. Verify HUD appears at the same position

title: Load persisted HUD size on page reload
description: When HUD is resized and page is reloaded, HUD should maintain last saved size
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Resize HUD from right edge to increase width
3. Resize HUD from bottom edge to increase height
4. Note the final dimensions
5. Reload the page (F5)
6. Verify HUD has the same dimensions

title: Drag HUD within viewport boundaries
description: HUD should move smoothly when dragged from header
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Position mouse on HUD header (LinguaLive v2 text area)
3. Click and drag HUD to different position
4. Release mouse
5. Verify HUD moved to new position

title: Resize from right edge
description: Dragging from right edge should change width
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Position mouse on right edge of HUD
3. Verify cursor changes to 'ew-resize'
4. Click and drag right
5. Verify width increases

title: Minimize HUD to header pill
description: Clicking minimize button should hide body content
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Verify HUD shows full content (header + body)
3. Click the '−' (minimize) button in header
4. Verify body content is hidden
5. Verify header pill remains visible

title: Close HUD
description: Clicking close button should hide the entire HUD
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Verify HUD is visible
3. Click the '×' (close) button in header
4. Verify HUD is hidden from page

title: Light theme rendering
description: Clicking theme icon should cycle to light theme
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Click the palette icon (first button in header)
3. Verify HUD background becomes light colored
4. Verify HUD text becomes dark colored
5. Verify border color is light gray

title: Theme cycling loop
description: Theme icon should cycle through all 3 themes in order
steps: 1. Click theme icon and note current theme
2. Click icon 4 times total
3. Verify theme cycles: light → dark → blue → light
4. Verify no additional themes beyond the 3

title: Header buttons have aria-labels
description: All header buttons should have descriptive aria-labels
steps: 1. Open extension popup and trigger demo translation
2. Inspect HUD minimize button in DevTools
3. Verify aria-label='Minimize panel' exists
4. Inspect close button and verify aria-label='Close panel'
5. Inspect theme button and verify aria-label='Change theme'
